# dataEncodingStrategy

**Instance Property**

The strategy that an encoder uses to encode raw data.

## Declaration

```swift
var dataEncodingStrategy: JSONEncoder.DataEncodingStrategy { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default strategy is the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/JSONEncoder/DataEncodingStrategy-swift.enum/base64] strategy.

## Encoding Raw Data

- **JSONEncoder.DataEncodingStrategy**: The strategies for encoding raw data.
